n8n.description: n8n is a fair-code licensed workflow automation tool. It allows you to connect apps and services, automate tasks, and create complex workflows with a visual editor.
n8n.more_info:
n8n Workflow Automation

n8n is a powerful, extendable workflow automation tool that can connect to hundreds of services. Perfect for automating business processes, data synchronization, and integrations.

First-time Setup:

  • Access the web UI at the configured port
  • Create your first user account
  • Start building workflows!

Security Notes:

  • Enable basic auth for production use
  • Consider setting up SSL/TLS reverse proxy
  • Keep credentials secure in n8n's encrypted storage

Resources:

  • Official Documentation
  • Workflow Templates
